channel.title: Using a playstation controller with Minecraft?
channel.description:
Alright, so I have the drivers to let me use a PS3 controller with minecraft, the only unfortunate thing is, I can't change the settings for how I change direction. Does anyone know how to set up the controllers to do mouse movements?
Note: Sorry if this might need to go in general questions section.

item.title: Using a playstation controller with Minecraft?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Try Xpadder. It has mouse controlling as well. You could even use the Windows feature that allows you to control the cursor using the keys, or even quickly make a .NET Application that reads the Controller analog position, since the .NET Framework easily supports changing the cursor’s position.

Also, thanks for giving me the idea. I’m going to try that with my Joypad >.>
